templateOptions.label: Set department in Zenya
templateOptions.description: Please note that we can only set a department that already exists in Zenya. For this, all departments must have a unique name within the entire tree (i.e., no duplicate names anywhere). In addition, maintenance of the departments will need to take place within Zenya

templateOptions.label: Set manager in Zenya
templateOptions.description: Please note that we can only set a manager that exists in Zenya and has been created by HelloID. For this, HelloID has to have granted the Account entitlement for the manager first.
